import React from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Navbar(props) { const history = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); localStorage.removeItem('token'); history("/"); } return ( <>
{props.title}
  • Home
  • Write
  • Your_Blogs
  • About
{!localStorage.getItem('token') ?
Login Signup
: Logout}
) }
